Messages.Message: Hey Oliver! You look tired. Did you have a long day?
I was afraid you were going to miss out on everything going on tonight. Your friends just came through.
Not anymo... Gah, the [wave]wind[/wave] just blew the door shut. I lost the [yellow]Hall Key[/color] earlier today when I was unloading barrels of apple cider.
Do you think you could help me out and look around for it? We're all stuck in here until we find it.
Also, Gullivan left his [yellow]Journal[/color] here. Could you take it to him after you get the door unlocked?
Yeah. Do you know where my friends all went?
It looked like they were heading towards the lagoon.
...Thanks. I better go find that key.
